==Profile==
Some time after the [[Cataclysm]], the [[Traveler's Sibling]] and [[Chlothar]] explored the [[Unknown Sanctuary]], where they found a chained up levitating object that resembles the [[Defiled Statue]]. The Sibling heard a voice inside their head that claims not to be a god, but a "Sinner," who knows the Sibling's fate and that it will "shed a tear at the end of time... as I gaze back upon your life.". It imbues Chlothar with the power of the [[Abyss]] that is later able to make [[Caribert (NPC)|Caribert]] sentient and verbal. Chlothar is at peace upon meeting the "Sinner" and calls it "a truly mighty god" that he will worship. When the Sibling and Chlothar return to the Sanctuary, the chained object, its worshippers, and the voice are absent. Given that Chlothar later goes on to establish [[Abyss Order]], it is likely that the Order worships the "Sinner" as a key part of their identity and deeds.
